bug.author: saudet
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h4>Issue Description</denchmark-h>
Deeplearning4j cannot be released to the Central without all necessary Javadoc artifacts. There are currently a few missing ones as reported by the Central when trying to close a staging repository: <denchmark-code>typeId | javadoc-staging -- | -- failureMessage | Missing: no javadoc jar found in folder '/org/deeplearning4j/dl4j-spark-ml_2.10/0.8.1_spark_1' failureMessage | Missing: no javadoc jar found in folder '/org/deeplearning4j/dl4j-spark-ml_2.11/0.8.1_spark_2' failureMessage | Missing: no javadoc jar found in folder '/org/deeplearning4j/dl4j-spark-ml_2.11/0.8.1_spark_1' </denchmark-code>

comments.comment: This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
